contest-event.event-date:
June 20, 1896 D Hardraw Scar
Hardraw Scar 0 Entertainments Contest Hardraw Scar hardraw-scar
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Green Dragon Inn, Hardraw, North Yorkshire 16th annual contest. Prizes: £20, £13, £6, £3 In the quickstep contest he awarded the first prize of £2 to Wyke Temperance Band, who played "King of the Seas" , the second prize of £1 he divided between Kingston Mills, who played "Viva Pettee" and Linthwaite, who played "Washington Greys." The 30s. offered as a prize for the neatest costume was awarded to the Trawden Band. 6 bands competed.
Jan. 3, 2012, 9:45 a.m. June 30, 2019, 8:46 p.m.
1 Wyke Edwin Swift Bayreuth
2 West Hartlepool Old Alexander Owen Heroic
3 Linthwaite Silver Band Edwin Swift Bayreuth
4 Kingston Mills Band John Gladney Jnr Weber Fantasia [arr. Gladney]
4 Trawden Brass Alexander Owen Selection from Berlioz
Unknown Result Norland Unknown
Withdrawn Irwell Bank Unknown
Withdrawn Oldham Rifles Band Unknown
